entry.title: The Only Thing You Let Hold You (Is Me)
entry.summary:
Author: adoctoraday

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,864Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: Stiles goes looking for Boyd and Erica and finds something else entirely. ~~~Derek scowls and steps closer, "What are you doing out here?" he counters and Stiles rolls his eyes, exasperation burning through him."Looking for Erica and Boyd," he retorts, "Chris let them go and said they headed this direction, so I'm trying to find some sign of them," he explains tightly, guilt running through him once more that he'd done so little to try and free them. He'd told Derek about their capture at the warehouse, after everything had died down, but it didn't feel like enough.Derek's scowl twists into confusion and he shifts uneasily, "Why are you looking for them? You aren't pack, you barely liked them," he says and Stiles sort of wants to punch him for that, but he also knows it's a little true‚Äîhe's been resistant to joining Derek's pack, and hasn't exactly gotten along with the betas, but still, that doesn't mean he wants them gone."Because I was in that basement too, remember?" he demands, turning his cheek a little so his bruises are more apparent, watching as Derek's gaze lingers there for a long moment, his jaw working harshly before he looks away and nods.

entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,573Chapters: 9/16Kudos: 128

Summary: Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski of the Nemetan rifle regiment can't find it in his heart to celebrate the end of the long and bloody war against the darachs. Perhaps it‚Äôs the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time, dark magic and musket balls, or perhaps it‚Äôs the doubt he harbours that he can truly be good at anything except being a soldier. Regardless, as he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worthy of the name, he listens as the locals sing their songs and toast to the fallen. He doesn't think about the men he has lost, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale, leader of the Triskellan battle-pack, who was last seen leaping into the heart of the fighting with typical reckless heroism. Even if Hale had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. Shifters were too different from humans - too wild, too strange. It didn't matter that Stiles felt like the only person who could see past the teeth and claws to the heart of the man beneath them. They were from two different worlds.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,052Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 193

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren‚Äôt the only danger, here‚Äôs hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,004Chapters: 1/18Kudos: 11

But Gerard's out on the prowl, bloodthirsty for revenge and there is a Kanima running around town killing people, seemingly at random. More importantly, will Chris be able to move past what he's done?While the pack races to figure out who the Kanima is and Stiles attempts to control his ever-growing magic, Gerard Argent looms closer and closer, threatening to unravel the pack and the happiness they have found. He‚Äôs been living with Scott since they were 19, and now that they‚Äôre grown, they rent a house with two other guys they met online. entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,806Chapters: 10/40Kudos: 59

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn‚Äôt hate the cage that once held him.They‚Äôd build a stronger one.

Summary: Derek Hale is looking for his mate, when he gets a call from his sister, but when he finds her, he sees a dead body of the one last sibling he had left, but he found who he was originally looking for.Stiles has been having terrifying dreams or visions, for over a month of a creature, that kills innocent people, and he can tell the creature wants something from him, but it‚Äôs not what he expects.Scott has been worried about his best friend, but one night he goes into the woods and gets bitten by a wolf, but he didn‚Äôt know that. He doesn‚Äôt understand what is going on with him or his best friend.Peter Hale had bitten Scott in the woods not long ago, but he found someone much more interesting. Stiles Stilinski. Peter figures out that Stiles is Derek‚Äôs mate, but what he didn‚Äôt expect was that Stiles was his mate as well. This changes Peter‚Äôs whole path of his plan. His goal is to now, make Stiles his mate before Derek even gets the chance. No matter the consequences.
